title: BLINK (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK BLINK
Simulates a blinking signal (turning on and off for specific durations)

rows.Name: ENABLE
rows.Comment: TRUE: Starts blinkingFALSE: Stops blinking whereasOUTkeeps its value

rows.Name: OUT
rows.Comment: Output value, starts withFALSEand switches betweenTRUEandFALSEfor the given high and low times
